sentences.en: ...a writer who incarnates the changing consciousness of the Americas.
sentences.cn: ...典型地体现出美洲观念变化的一位作家。
他是愤世嫉俗的极端体现。

sentences.en: Incarnate. You make some psionic effects permanent.
sentences.cn: 灵能恒定术:使一些灵能永久有效.

sentences.en: Jesus, the incarnate Son of God
Jesus, Word of God Incarnate, of Virgin Mary born.
sentences.cn: 耶稣道成肉身, 由童贞女马利亚所生.

sentences.en: She is Wisdom Incarnate, the Goddess of all those who are wise.
sentences.cn: 她是智慧的化身, 是所有一切智慧的女神.

sentences.en: Solving some diffraction problems by the method will incarnate its unique advantage.
sentences.cn: 用这种方法求解某些衍射问题,会体现出它的特殊的优势.

sentences.en: That enemy officer is a devil incarnate.
sentences.cn: 那个敌军军官简直是魔鬼的化身.

sentences.en: That incarnate no matter how callous profession are full of love.
sentences.cn: 体现了不论是多么冷酷的职业,都充满着爱.

sentences.en: The goodness and love of God incarnate at Bethlehem.
sentences.cn: 上帝良善及慈爱的化身,降临在伯利恒.

sentences.en: The iniquities of the regime are incarnated in one man.
sentences.cn: 该体制的种种劣迹集中体现于一人。

sentences.en: The leader seemed the devil incarnate.
sentences.cn: 那个首领好像是魔鬼的化身。

sentences.en: The media cast him as the devil incarnate (= someone very evil ).
sentences.cn: 媒体把他描述成魔鬼的化身。

sentences.en: The pharaoh is Osiris, the moon bull incarnate.
sentences.cn: 这位法老就是俄西里斯，丰产神的化身。

sentences.en: The process of brand creation need incarnate in each project construction process.
sentences.cn: 品牌创建的过程,需要在项目建设的各个过程体现.

sentences.en: Those incarnate upon Maldek objected, and a war broke out.
sentences.cn: 马尔戴克上的个体们拒绝了, 战争爆发.

sentences.en: Why should God become incarnate as a male?
sentences.cn: 为什么上帝以男性之身显现呢？

words.tran_cn: 化身的；人体化的；肉色的
体现；使…具体化；使实体化

trans.tran_cn: 人体化的，拟人化的，肉色的，粉红色的
体现, 使具体化, 使成化身
trans.tran_en: If you say that a quality is incarnated in a person, you mean that they represent that quality or are typical of it in an extreme form

trans.tran_cn: 使成化身，使具体化，成为…典型
